Token.Abstract: An RKMappingTestExpectation object defines an expected mapping event that should occur during the execution of a RKMappingTest.
Creates and returns a new expectation specifying that a key path in a source object should be mapped to another key path on a destination object. The value mapped is not evaluated.

Parameter.Name: sourceKeyPath
Parameter.Abstract: A key path on the source object that should be mapped.

Parameter.Name: destinationKeyPath
Parameter.Abstract: A key path on the destination object that should be mapped onto.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An expectation specifying that sourceKeyPath should be mapped to destinationKeyPath.

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns a new expectation specifying that a key path in a source object should be mapped to another key path on a destination object with a given value.

Parameter.Name: sourceKeyPath
Parameter.Abstract: A key path on the source object that should be mapped.

Parameter.Name: destinationKeyPath
Parameter.Abstract: A key path on the destination object that should be mapped onto.

Parameter.Name: value
Parameter.Abstract: The value that is expected to be assigned to the destination object at destinationKeyPath.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An expectation specifying that sourceKeyPath should be mapped to destinationKeyPath with value.

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns a new expectation specifying that a key path in a source object should be mapped to another key path on a destinaton object and that the attribute mapping and value should evaluate to true with a given block.

Parameter.Name: sourceKeyPath
Parameter.Abstract: A key path on the source object that should be mapped.

Parameter.Name: destinationKeyPath
Parameter.Abstract: A key path on the destination object that should be mapped onto.

Parameter.Name: evaluationBlock
Parameter.Abstract: A block with which to evaluate the success of the mapping.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An expectation specifying that sourceKeyPath should be mapped to destinationKeyPath with value.

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns a new expectation specifying that a key path in a source object should be mapped to another key path on a destinaton object using a specific object mapping for the relationship.

Parameter.Name: sourceKeyPath
Parameter.Abstract: A key path on the source object that should be mapped.

Parameter.Name: destinationKeyPath
Parameter.Abstract: A key path on the destination object that should be mapped onto.

Parameter.Name: mapping
Parameter.Abstract: An object mapping that is expected to be used for mapping the nested relationship.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An expectation specifying that sourceKeyPath should be mapped to destinationKeyPath using a specific object mapping.

Token.Abstract: Returns a keyPath on the source object that a value should be mapped from.
Returns a keyPath on the source object that a value should be mapped from.
Returns a keyPath on the destination object that a value should be mapped to.
Returns a keyPath on the destination object that a value should be mapped to.
Returns the expected value that should be set to the destinationKeyPath of the destination object.
Returns the expected value that should be set to the destinationKeyPath of the destination object.
A block used to evaluate if the expectation has been satisfied.
A block used to evaluate if the expectation has been satisfied.
Returns the expected object mapping to be used for mapping a nested relationship.
Returns the expected object mapping to be used for mapping a nested relationship.
Returns a string summary of the expected keyPath mapping within the expectation

ReturnValue.Abstract: A string describing the expected sourceKeyPath to destinationKeyPath mapping.
